1.0.name: wordpress/event-listing-provided-by-attendstar
1.0.description:
We created this plugin to present a more modern and clean look for your event listings. It does not use the typical calendar graphic.

Events are sorted with the soonest event first. You may name the directory to be used for your installation There is a Widget that displays the most common used tags There is a Details button where you can place a URL for more information or to buy tickets to your event.

*This plugin is i18n ready.
